mapper.update:
update invest_detail
invest_id = #{investId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ob_time = #{obTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
in_time = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
invest_detail_code = #{investDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where invest_detail_id = #{investDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update invest_detail set invest_id = #{investId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ob_time = #{obTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, in_time = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, invest_detail_code = #{investDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where invest_detail_id = #{investDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from invest_detail where user_id = #{userId} group by created_time desc;
select DISTINCT user_id from invest_detail where movie_id=#{movieId} group by user_id;
select sum(amount) from invest_detail where movie_id = #{movieId}
